desc: Receive or gift a curated selection of beauty products, fashion and lifestyle accessories, all packed in a beautiful box and delivered for free every month. Pamper yourself and your loved ones with a unique gift and subscribe for a monthly plan, commitment free.

layout.text: An all exclusive, all limited edition box coming to you this February from the Karl Lagerfeld + Modelco brand.
A feast for the eyes and a treat for the look.
